q: The official announcement states: Starting from April 4, Larry Page , Google Co-Founder, will take charge of Google's day-to-day operations as Chief Executive Officer. As for what Eric Schmidt will now do: Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman, focusing externally on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach. Internally, he will continue to act as an advisor to Larry Page and Sergey. There's still a few months to go until the change happens, but it's sure to dominate any Q&A sessions the top-tier of Eric Schmidt , Larry Page and Brin have until that time. There's

as a radio talk-show host, he started a TV show in 1995. Although Mike Pence was inspired by Rush Limbaugh , he kept to his`` no personal attacks'' pledge. Conservative media, including Rush Limbaugh , have a tremendous blind spot when it comes to making a distinction between differences in public policy and personal differences, Mike Pence told The Indianapolis Star in 1995.
